#!/static/bin/ash
#lesslinux provides dbus #lesslinux license BSD
PATH=/static/bin:/static/sbin:/bin:/sbin:/usr/bin:/usr/sbin export PATH
. /etc/rc.defaults . /etc/rc.subr/extractbootparams . /etc/rc.subr/colors
case $1 in start) printf "${bold}===> Starting DBUS ${normal}\n" mountpoint -q /usr/var || mount -t tmpfs -o mode=0755 tmpfs /usr/var mkdir -p /usr/var/lib/dbus mkdir -p /usr/var/run/dbus mkdir -p /var/lib/dbus mkdir -p /var/run/dbus if [ '!' -f /var/lib/dbus/machine-id ] ; then dbus-uuidgen --ensure fi [ "$security" = "smack" ] && \ echo netmgr > /proc/self/attr/current /usr/bin/dbus-daemon --config-file=/etc/dbus-1/system.conf ;; stop) true # echo "FIXME: properly stop dbus" ;; esac
